result:
<a-modal title="修改角色" :visible="value" @cancel="bindClickCancel" @ok="bindClickSubmit" cancelText="取消" okText="提交">
    <a-form :form="form">
        <a-form-item label="角色名称" v-bind="formItemLayout">
            <a-input placeholder="请输入" v-decorator="[
                'roleName',
                {
                    initialValue: localRole.roleName,
                    rules: [
                        {required: true, message: '角色名称不能为空'}
                    ],
                    validateTrigger: ['blur']
                }
            ]"/>
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item label="角色描述" v-bind="formItemLayout">
            <a-textarea placeholder="请输入" :rows="4" v-decorator="[
                'roleDescription',
                {initialValue: localRole.roleDescription}
            ]"/>
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item label="角色状态" v-bind="formItemLayout">
            <a-switch v-model="localRole.roleStatus"/>
        </a-form-item>
    </a-form>
</a-modal>
